g = codec.decode(
    """
        # ::snt I think you failed to not not act.
        (t / think
           :ARG0 (i / i)
           :ARG1 (f / fail
              :ARG0 (y / you)
              :ARG1 (a / act
                 :polarity -
                 :polarity -)))"""
    )
assert configure(g) == Tree(('t', [('/', 'think'), (':ARG0', ('i', [('/',
    'i')])), (':ARG1', ('f', [('/', 'fail'), (':ARG0', ('y', [('/', 'you')]
    )), (':ARG1', ('a', [('/', 'act'), (':polarity', '-'), (':polarity',
    '-')]))]))]))
